name: Telekinesis (Minor)
effect: Move or throw light objects with mental force.
description: Basic telekinetic ability to lift and manipulate objects weighing up to 60 lbs + 10 lbs per level.

name: Deaden Pain
effect: Ignore pain penalties; fight at full strength.
description: Temporarily blocks pain receptors, allowing continued combat despite injuries.

name: Float / Levitate
effect: Lift or move vertically through the air.
description: Rise into the air or float on water, moving slowly but steadily.

name: Nightvision
effect: See clearly in total darkness up to 60 ft.
description: Enhanced vision that penetrates darkness and low-light conditions.

name: Resist Fatigue
effect: Prevents exhaustion penalties in long fights.
description: Mental discipline that delays the effects of physical exhaustion.

name: Sixth Sense
effect: Detects danger automatically; +2 dodge/parry.
description: Precognitive awareness that warns of immediate threats and ambushes.

name: Bio-Feedback
effect: Adds +10 temporary S.D.C.
description: Mental control over body functions, temporarily increasing physical resilience.

name: Zen Combat Focus
effect: +2 strike/parry/dodge; +1 initiative.
description: Heightened combat awareness and reflexes through mental discipline.

name: Alter Aura
effect: Disguise personal aura to fool detection magic.
description: Mentally alter your psychic signature to appear different to magical detection.

name: Balance Sense
effect: Perfect equilibrium; +4 to climbing and balance checks.
description: Enhanced sense of balance and spatial awareness.

name: Bio-Manipulation (Paralysis)
effect: Paralyze target; victim saves vs psionics.
description: Direct manipulation of target's nervous system to cause paralysis.

name: Impervious to Cold
effect: Immune to cold damage and effects.
description: Mental control over body temperature provides immunity to cold.

name: Impervious to Fire
effect: Immune to normal fire and heat damage.
description: Mental barrier that protects against fire and extreme heat.

name: Impervious to Poison/Toxin
effect: Neutralizes most toxins and venoms.
description: Mental control over metabolism to neutralize harmful substances.

name: Levitation
effect: Lift self or object slowly into the air.
description: Rise vertically at 60 feet per minute, carrying up to own weight.

name: Sense Evil
effect: Detects hostile or malevolent intent.
description: Psychic radar that detects evil intentions and malevolent creatures.

name: Sense Magic
effect: Detect magical energy and enchanted items.
description: Psychic sensitivity to magical auras and enchanted objects.

name: Weight Manipulation
effect: Increase/decrease own weight for short bursts.
description: Temporarily alter personal gravity and weight for tactical advantage.

name: Telepathy
effect: Two-way mental communication.
description: Direct mind-to-mind communication with willing or weak-willed targets.

name: Presence Sense
effect: Detects living presences or invisible enemies.
description: Psychic awareness of all living beings within range.

name: Clairvoyance
effect: Brief glimpse into near-future combat outcome.
description: Momentary vision of immediate future events or outcomes.

name: Clairaudience
effect: Hear distant sounds or conversations.
description: Psychic hearing that extends beyond normal range.

name: Empathy
effect: Read emotions of others.
description: Psychic sensitivity to the emotional states of others.

name: Intuitive Combat
effect: +2 initiative and dodge; lasts 2 melees.
description: Enhanced combat reflexes through psychic intuition.

name: Meditation
effect: Doubles I.S.P. recovery rate.
description: Deep mental discipline that accelerates psychic energy recovery.

name: Object Read (Psychometry)
effect: Reads psychic residue from an object.
description: Psychic reading of an object's history and previous owners.

name: See Aura
effect: Read alignment, level, health of target.
description: Psychic vision that reveals auras, alignment, and general health status.

name: Sense Time
effect: Always know exact time of day within seconds.
description: Internal chronometer that provides precise time awareness.

name: Sense Psionics
effect: Detect other psionic users and I.S.P. energy.
description: Psychic radar that detects other psionic individuals and energy.

name: Truth Sense
effect: Sense if a statement is truthful.
description: Psychic ability to detect lies and deception.

name: Detect Concealment/Traps (Psychic)
effect: Feel nearby hidden dangers or magical triggers.
description: Psychic awareness of hidden dangers, traps, and magical triggers.

name: Mind Block Auto-Defense
effect: +6 save vs psionics; activates automatically.
description: Automatic mental shield that activates against psionic attacks.

name: Stop Bleeding
effect: Halts blood loss; stabilizes dying ally.
description: Mental control over blood flow to stop bleeding and stabilize wounds.

name: Bio-Regeneration (Minor)
effect: Heal 2d6 S.D.C. or 1d6 H.P.
description: Accelerated natural healing through mental control over body functions.

name: Bio-Regeneration (Super)
effect: Heal 4d6 S.D.C. or 2d6 H.P.; regrows tissue.
description: Advanced healing that can regenerate lost tissue and organs.

name: Detect Poison/Toxin
effect: Identify harmful substances by touch or sight.
description: Psychic sensitivity to detect poisons and toxins.

name: Detect Disease
effect: Identify illness in a person or animal.
description: Psychic diagnosis of diseases and medical conditions.

name: Diagnose Illness
effect: Determine general medical condition.
description: Basic psychic assessment of overall health and medical status.

name: Induce Sleep
effect: Puts one target to sleep.
description: Mental suggestion that causes deep, natural sleep.

name: Increase Healing
effect: Doubles natural healing rate for one day.
description: Mental enhancement that accelerates natural recovery processes.

name: Internal Strength
effect: +2 P.E.; +1 save vs poison/magic.
description: Mental control that temporarily enhances physical endurance.

name: Purify Self
effect: Remove poisons or enemy toxins.
description: Mental purification that removes toxins and impurities from the body.

name: Metabolic Control
effect: Slow heartbeat, breathing, hunger; fakes death.
description: Complete control over metabolic functions, including ability to feign death.

name: Psi-Sword
effect: Summons energy blade; counts as melee weapon.
description: Creates a blade of pure psionic energy that cuts through physical and magical defenses.

name: Mind Bolt
effect: Launch psionic energy at enemy.
description: Pure psionic energy blast that bypasses physical armor.

name: Psi-Shield
effect: +6 AR vs psionic/magic attacks; absorbs energy.
description: Mental force field that deflects psionic and magical attacks.

name: Pyrokinesis
effect: Ignite or hurl small flames.
description: Mental control over fire, allowing ignition and manipulation of flames.

name: Telekinesis (Super)
effect: Lift or hurl heavy objects by mind.
description: Advanced telekinesis capable of moving massive objects and throwing them with great force.

name: Astral Projection
effect: Leave body; travel the astral plane.
description: Separate consciousness from body to travel in astral form.

name: Mind Block
effect: Immune to mind control or telepathy.
description: Strong mental barrier that blocks all psionic intrusion attempts.

name: Ejection/Astral Combat
effect: Battle or drive off other spirits in astral form.
description: Astral combat ability to fight other spirits and astral entities.

name: Psi-Spear / Kinetic Burst
effect: Ranged telekinetic impale attack.
description: Focused telekinetic attack that creates a spear-like burst of force.

name: Empathic Transmission
effect: Cause emotional distress, fear, or calm.
description: Project emotions into others to influence their mental state.

name: Psychic Purge
effect: Removes negative mental effects from allies.
description: Powerful mental cleansing that removes psionic debuffs and mental effects.

name: Total Recall
effect: Perfect memory of any seen/heard info.
description: Perfect memory that allows instant recall of any information ever perceived.

name: Summon Inner Strength (Boost)
effect: +10 I.S.P. temporarily and +1 attack/melee.
description: Temporary surge of psionic power that enhances abilities.

name: Mind Bond / Domination
effect: Control or command one target.
description: Complete mental domination over a single target's will.

name: Mass Telepathy
effect: Communicate with up to 10 minds simultaneously.
description: Group telepathic communication linking multiple minds together.

name: Telemechanics
effect: Interface mentally with machines.
description: Psychic interface with mechanical devices and technology.
